Posts.Content: My dad has been diagnosed with prostate cancer, but here is what I know of his results. Please someone tell what it means... Prostate scan Gleason score is 8. Bone scan clear / no other signs increase in isotopic uptake in the adrenal gland, mesentery, retroperitoneal constant with mestasis outside the pelvic area Is is treatable? What does it mean?
Posts.Title: Rare Prostate Cancer help
